item.title: Blending AI and Product Management
item.description: The introduction of AI into product development represents a transformative shift in how products are developed, managed and evolved. AI is integrating into various stages of the product management lifecycle and it not only accelerates the pace of innovation but also introduces new capabilities and challenges. The role of Product Manager must also evolve alongside the changes posed by AI to ensure that they understand the potential, limitations and risks of AI.
